moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 d6: Don't often see this move played, still I carried on the way I normally would after Nc6.
moves.3. Bc4 h6 4. d4: If he's going to play a bit defensive I'll attack.
moves.4... Bg4 5. Be3 Nf6 6. dxe5 Nxe4 7. Bxf7: Sac the bishop to get my queen into the game and eliminate the knight posted in a good position.
moves.7... Kxf7 8. Qd5+ Ke8 9. Qxe4 Bxf3 10. Q: Happy so far with my position.
moves.11... Qe7 12. Qf5: Protecting the pawn which will be a massive headache.
moves.12... g5 13. Nc3 Ne5: Bad move in my opinion, it allows the queen to move and protect against the mate but had to protect d5. Thoughts on this?
moves.19. O-O-O+: No way in avoiding mate from here.
